echarts-enhanced-completion.init.enabled: Additional example options are displayed when completion is triggered in an empty options object.
echarts-enhanced-completion.init.onlyIni: Only display the initialization example option during initialization.
echarts-enhanced-completion.init.showPic: Preview image at the top showing sample options.
message.unknown-property: The attribute "${0}" does not exist on the "${1}".
message.rule-config-error: There is an error in the `echarts-enhanced-completion.rule` configuration item.
